pullrequest.title: Refactor example building test, fix standalone examples (#1555)

content.raw: It would be cool if this test and the one below pulled the names of the examples from CMakeLists.txt or from the names of source files in the directory, so that we don't have to add the names of new examples as we add them. This would make it hard to disable testing certain examples, but since we're just testing compilation, I don't think we have to worry about exceptions.
content.html: It would be cool if this test and the one below pulled the names of the examples from CMakeLists.txt or from the names of source files in the directory, so that we don't have to add the names of new examples as we add them. This would make it hard to disable testing certain examples, but since we're just testing compilation, I don't think we have to worry about exceptions.
